thread.title: Adell Henry
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Adell Henry

author: Adell Henry
title: Adell Henry
text: I have ordered twice now and was completely satisfied with everything. Easy to find books, easy to order, easy to check out, great prices! Can't have it better. Free shipping is pretty fast so even that is easy. Overall great place to get books at low prices. And the books are in decent condition. Well worth it.
